divs: Sighting Details I was in my driveway. I noticed a streaking point of light traveling north to southeast. I thought the object might be a satellite or plane, but then it stopped. Two other lights converged upon it, then, after a split second, retreated and disappeared. My daughter brought me a pair of binoculars. At 7x magnification, the object was an oval that glowed red. It the vanished.
Summary: A streaking light that stopped and was joined by 2
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Utica
There were no other sightings in Utica on or around June 28th 2003
